DOC.brief_summary: Currently , clear consensus exist regard effect epidural anesthesia upon breast-feeding . In theory , epidural may increase breast-feeding failure via inadequate maternal milk production , deficiency neonatal neurobehavior , , study fail separate potential mechanism . The present study examine whether epidural duration correlate 1 ) likelihood breast-feeding hospital discharge 2 ) neonatal neurobehavioral deficit feed , measure L & A component standardize , validate LATCH score system .
